attributes.action: Hold a full investigation into the alleged tampering of ballot boxes at the GLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goings on at the polling stations and storage centre involved in the taking and storing of the votes for the Greater London Assembly seem suspicious to say the least,there needs to be a full and massive investigation into this,and now!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
